dialogues.name: LK_welcomeContent_02
dialogues.text: Time to customise your very own F1 Car. Get ready to deck out your very own livery and make unique to your style.

dialogues.name: l_text_8
dialogues.text: We're just tidying the garage for you.....

dialogues.name: l_text_10
dialogues.text: [TEXT / IMAGES REQUIRED] Above is the 3D area which shows your car straight from the engineers.

dialogues.name: l_text_11
dialogues.text: You can touch and drag the 3D panel to look around the car.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_welcome_2
dialogues.text: Time to see your custom design in WebAR. Get ready to see your work of art up close and personal in the real world.
